data.text: “Onipa a ɔbaa awo no no
Ɔfefɛ te sɛ nhwiren na ɛtwintwam;
Woma wʼani kɔ saa onipa yi so?
Hwan na ɔbɛtumi ayi deɛ ɛyɛ kronn afiri efi mu?
Woahyehyɛ onipa nkwa nna;
Enti, yi wʼani firi ne so na ɔnyɛ deɛ ɔpɛ,
“Dua mpo anidasoɔ wɔ hɔ ma no:
Ne nhini bɛtumi anyini akyɛre asase mu
nanso, ɔnya nsuo a ɛfefɛ,
Nanso, sɛ nnipa wu a wɔde no hyɛ fam;
Sɛdeɛ nsuo tu yera wɔ ɛpo mu no,
saa ara na onipa tɔ fam na ɔnsɔre bio;
“Sɛ anka wode me bɛsie damena mu
Sɛ onipa wu a, ɔbɛba nkwa mu bio anaa?
Wobɛfrɛ na mɛgye wo so;
Afei wobɛkan mʼanammɔntuo
Wɔbɛsɔ me bɔne ano wɔ kotokuo mu,
“Nanso, sɛdeɛ mmepɔ so hohoro na ɛdwirie
sɛdeɛ nsuo yiyi aboɔ ho
Wotintim ne so prɛko pɛ, na ɔtwam kɔ;
Sɛ wɔhyɛ ne mmammarima animuonyam a, ɔnnim;
Ɔno ara wedeɛ mu yea na ɔteɛ
